text:
Hi,I've installed httpd2410,apr151.
But when I yum mod_ssl ,it downgrade apr&apr-util to 1.3.9 ,
Would this version make my httpd work with some exception ?
Is there other better solution about enable https access ?
creator: love2think@sina.cn

text: no APR bug -- I'd suggest taking it up with whoever is responsible for the packages you're using.
creator: covener@gmail.com
